message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this valuable product to you today.  I think you'll find it's worth a great deal. How about $115 to start?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, and I want to be fair.  How about we split the difference and call it $110?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $108? I'm really interested in this product and would like to make a deal.
